overview: Before joining Asure Software, Steven W Rodriguez served as a Principal for HCS, a consulting company he founded. Prior to that, he was the Executive Vice President and Officer at Perquest, a National Workforce Management Company dedicated to providing innovative technology and superior Client Services. Previously, Steven served as Senior Vice President of Sales & Sales Operations at Ceridian Corporation, a global human resource services company. Mr. Rodriguez holds a Bachelors of Business Administration from the University of Oklahoma.
